Package com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.services

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExpiringFileResource
    Extends the default file resource interface with tracking properties which can be used for expiration.
    FileManager
    Central interface providing access to the underlying file repositories.
    FileManagerAware
    Interface that can be implemented by a FileRepository.
    FileRepository
    Interface for a single file repository, allowing storing and getting of a single file.
    FileRepositoryFactory
    Service interface for the factory responsible for creating FileRepository instances if they do not yet exist.
    FileRepositoryRegistry
    Management service to manage the registered FileRepository instances.
    PathGenerator
    PathGenerator interface can be used to dynamically generate a path to distribute files in a repository.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractExpiringFileRepository<T extends ExpiringFileResource>
    Base class for a file repository which tracks its file resources and expires them according to a specific AbstractExpiringFileRepository.expirationStrategy.
    AbstractFileRepository
    Base class for FileRepository implementations that delegate all resource methods to the FileResource instance.
    AmazonS3FileRepository
    FileRepository which stores its files in an Amazon S3 bucket.
    AmazonS3FileRepository.AmazonS3FileRepositoryBuilder  
    AwsS3FileRepository Deprecated
    since 1.4.0 - will be removed in 2.0.0, use AmazonS3FileRepository instead
    AzureFileRepository  
    AzureFileRepository.AzureFileRepositoryBuilder  
    AzureFileResource  
    AzureFolderResource  
    CachedFileResource
    Represents a caching wrapper around a target FileResource.
    CachingFileRepository
    FileRepository implementation which deals out cached file resources.
    CachingFileRepository.CachingFileRepositoryBuilder  
    DateFormatPathGenerator
    Generates a path based on the current timestamp and a date format pattern.
    ExpiringFileRepository
    FileRepository implementation which deals out file resources that expire according to a specified strategy.
    ExpiringFileRepository.ExpiringFileRepositoryBuilder  
    FileManagerImpl
    Implementation of both FileManager and FileRepositoryRegistry.
    FileRepositoryDelegate
    A FileRepository implementation that delegates its calls to an underlying implementation.
    LocalFileRepository
    The simplest of file repositories, storing all files in a set of local folders with one root parent folder.
    LocalFileRepository.LocalFileRepositoryBuilder  
    LocalFileRepositoryFactory
    Standard implementation that creates LocalFileRepository instances.
    SFTPFile  
    SpringIntegrationFileResource  
    SpringIntegrationFolderResource  
    SpringIntegrationFtpFileRepository  
    SpringIntegrationFtpFileRepository.SpringIntegrationFtpFileRepositoryBuilder  
    SpringIntegrationFtpFileResource  
    SpringIntegrationFtpFolderResource  
    SpringIntegrationSftpFileRepository  
    SpringIntegrationSftpFileRepository.SpringIntegrationSftpFileRepositoryBuilder  
    SpringIntegrationSftpFileResource  
    SpringIntegrationSftpFolderResource
